title: Candidate Forum
description: Hear from candidates on the November ballot at the League of Women Voters and the Lakewood Chamber of Commerceâ€™s candidates forum.

title: Lakewood Community Festival
description: Stop by to say hello and enjoy some kid-friendly activities at the Lakewood Community Festival.

title: Popsicles in the Park
description: School has started, but we can still hold onto the last remnants of summer weather! Bring the family for popsicles, play, and to meet school board candidate Martha Woerner.

title: Friend- and Fundraiser
description: Come meet Martha and get involved with the campaign at this friend- and fundraiser.

title: Lit Drop
description: Help spread the word about Martha to our Lakewood neighbors the afternoon of Sunday, October 15. Pick up materials at 1222 Chase from 2-4 PM and go for a stroll in Lakewood.

title: Postcard Party
description: Join us on Thursday, 10/26 from 3-5 PM at 1222 Chase to help send postcards to voters.
label: RSVP

title: Lit Drop
description: Take a stroll through a Lakewood neighborhood and drop off literature at voters houses on the afternoon of Saturday, November 4th. Pickup materials at 1222 Chase between 1 and 4.
